Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are high temperature fuel cells, which are being developed for large scale and distributed power systems.
Titulo: The Need for Nano-Scale Modeling in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: SOFCs promise to provide cleaner, more efficient electricity than traditional fossil fuel burning power plants.
Titulo: The Need for Nano-Scale Modeling in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Research over the last decade has improved the design and materials used in SOFCs to increase their performance and stability for long-term operation; however, there are still challenges for SOFC researchers to overcome before SOFCs can be considered competitive with traditional fossil fuel burning and renewable power systems.
Titulo: The Need for Nano-Scale Modeling in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In particular degradation due to contaminants in the fuel and oxidant stream is a major challenge facing SOFCs.
Titulo: The Need for Nano-Scale Modeling in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In this paper we discuss ongoing computational and experimental research into different degradation and design issues in SOFC electrodes.
Titulo: The Need for Nano-Scale Modeling in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: We focus on contaminants in gasified coal which cause electrochemical and structural degradation in the anode, and chromium poisoning which affects the electrochemistry of the cathode.
Titulo: The Need for Nano-Scale Modeling in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Due to the complex microstructures and multi-physics of SOFCs, multi-scale computational modeling and experimental research is needed to understand the detailed physics behind different degradation mechanisms, the local conditions within the cell which facilitate degradation, and its effects on the overall SOFC performance.
Titulo: The Need for Nano-Scale Modeling in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: We will discuss computational modeling research of SOFCs at the macro-, meso- and nano-scales which is being used to investigate the performance and degradation of SOFCs.
Titulo: The Need for Nano-Scale Modeling in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: We will also discuss the need for a multi-scale modeling framework of SOFCs, and the application of computational and multi-scale modeling to several degradation issues in SOFCs.
Titulo: The Need for Nano-Scale Modeling in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
